mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO exm_testexec (
id_testexec,
id_testplan_detail,
id_student,
id_medicalrec,
sort,
id_org,
sd_testexec,
dt_exec_begin,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexec},
#{idTestplanDetail},
#{idStudent},
#{idMedicalrec},
#{sort},
#{idOrg},
#{sdTestexec},
now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result (
id_testexec_result,
id_testexec,
serial,
fg_final_result,
fg_asses,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idTestexec},
#{serial},
#{fgFinalResult},
#{fgAsses},
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_inques (
id_testexec_result_inques,
id_testexec_result,
id_inques,
id_med_case_list,
fg_clue, gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultInques},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idInques},
#{idMedCaseList},
'0', now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_body (
id_testexec_result_body,
id_testexec_result,
id_body,
id_med_case_list,
fg_clue, gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultBody},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idBody},
#{idMedCaseList},
'0', now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_inspect (
id_testexec_result_inspect,
id_testexec_result,
id_med_case_list,
id_inspect_item,
id_die,
fg_clue, gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultInspect},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idMedCaseList},
#{idInspectItem},
#{idDie},
'0', now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_referral (
id_testexec_result_referral,
id_testexec_result,
id_die,
fg_die_class, fg_exclude, gmt_create, gmt_modify
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultReferral},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idDie},
#{fgDieClass}, '0', now(), now()
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_order (
id_testexec_result_order,
id_testexec_result,
des_check,
sd_nurs_rout,
cd_nurs_level,
sd_diet,
sd_position,
des_special,
fg_valid,
gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultOrder},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{desCheck},
#{sdNursRout},
#{cdNursLevel},
#{sdDiet},
#{sdPosition},
#{desSpecial},
#{fgValid},
now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_order_log_drugs ( id_testexec_result_order, id_long_drugs ) VALUES
(#{extId}, #{item})

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_order_short_drugs ( id_testexec_result_order, id_short_drugs ) VALUES
(#{extId}, #{item})

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_diagnosis (
id_testexec_result_diagnosis,
id_testexec_result,
id_die,
id_testexec_result_referral,
des_die_reason,
gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultDiagnosis},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{idDie},
#{idTestexecResultReferral},
#{desDieReason},
now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_summary (
id_testexec_result_sumary,
id_testexec_result,
die_sumary,
des_condition_hpi,
des_condition_pe,
des_condition_fe,
des_sumary_hpi,
des_sumary_pe,
des_sumary_fe,
gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultSumary},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{dieSumary},
#{desConditionHpi},
#{desConditionPe},
#{desConditionFe},
#{desSumaryHpi},
#{desSumaryPe},
#{desSumaryFe},
now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_die_reason ( id_testexec_result_diagnosis, sd_eva_effciency, id_med_case_list, id_inques, id_body, id_inspect_item, gmt_create ) VALUES
( #{item.idTestexecResultDiagnosis}, #{item.sdEvaEffciency}, #{item.idMedCaseList},
#{item.idInques},
null,
#{item.idBody},
null,
#{item.idInspectItem},
null,
now() )

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_die_reason ( id_testexec_result_diagnosis, sd_eva_effciency, id_med_case_list, id_inques, id_body, id_inspect_item, gmt_create ) SELECT #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis} , b.sd_eva_effciency , b.id_med_case_list , b.id_inques , b.id_body , b.id_inspect_item , now() FROM exm_med_result_referral_reason b WHERE b.id_testexec_result_referral = #{idTestexecResultReferral}

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_referral_reason( id_testexec_result_referral , fg_exclude , sd_eva_effciency , id_inques , id_body , id_inspect_item , id_med_case_list , fg_valid , gmt_create ) VALUES
( #{item.idTestexecResultReferral}, #{item.fgExclude}, #{item.sdEvaEffciency},
#{item.idInques},
null,
#{item.idBody},
null,
#{item.idInspectItem},
null,
#{item.idMedCaseList}, '0', now() )

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_identify (
id_testexec_result_identify,
id_testexec_result,
na_die,
des_die_reason,
gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idTestexecResultIdentify},
#{idTestexecResult},
#{naDie},
#{desDieReason},
now(),
)

INSERT INTO exm_med_result_identify_reason (
id_identify_reason,
id_testexec_result_identify,
sd_eva_effciency,
id_inques,
id_body,
id_inspect_item,
id_med_case_list,
fg_valid,
gmt_create,
) VALUES (
#{idIdentifyReason},
#{idTestexecResultIdentify},
#{sdEvaEffciency},
#{idInques},
#{idBody},
#{idInspectItem},
#{idMedCaseList},
#{fgValid},
now(),
)
mapper.update: update exm_testexec set dt_exec_end=now(), duration=TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, dt_exec_begin, now()), sd_testexec='2' where id_testexec = #{idTestexec}
update exm_med_result_inques set fg_valid=#{fgValid}, gmt_create=now() where id_testexec_result_inques = #{idTestexecResultInques}
update exm_med_result_referral set fg_exclude = '1', gmt_modify = now() where id_testexec_result_referral = #{idTestexecResultReferral}

UPDATE exm_med_result_order SET des_check = #{desCheck}, sd_nurs_rout = #{sdNursRout}, cd_nurs_level = #{cdNursLevel}, sd_diet = #{sdDiet}, sd_position = #{sdPosition}, des_special = #{desSpecial} WHERE id_testexec_result_order = #{idTestexecResultOrder}

UPDATE exm_med_result_diagnosis SET
id_die = #{idDie},
id_testexec_result_referral = #{idTestexecResultReferral},
des_die_reason = #{desDieReason},
WHERE id_testexec_result_diagnosis = #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis}

UPDATE exm_med_result_summary SET
die_sumary = #{dieSumary},
des_condition_hpi = #{desConditionHpi},
des_condition_pe = #{desConditionPe},
des_condition_fe = #{desConditionFe},
des_sumary_hpi = #{desSumaryHpi},
des_sumary_pe = #{desSumaryPe},
des_sumary_fe = #{desSumaryFe},
WHERE id_testexec_result_sumary = #{idTestexecResultSumary}

update exm_med_result_inspect set
id_die = #{idDie},
des_reply = #{desReply},
fg_valid=#{fgValid},
where
id_testexec_result_inspect = #{idTestexecResultInspect}
id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
and fg_valid = '0'

update exm_med_result_body set
id_die = #{idDie},
des_reply = #{desReply},
fg_valid=#{fgValid},
where
id_testexec_result_body = #{idTestexecResultBody}
id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
and fg_valid = '0'

update exm_eva_dimension set score_dimemsion = #{scoreDimemsion}, weight_score_dimemsion = ROUND(score_dimemsion * weight_dimemsion/100,2) where id_testexec_result_dimension = #{idTestexecResultDimension}
update exm_med_result set fg_asses = '1' where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult}
update exm_med_result_diagnosis set fg_valid = '1' where id_testexec_result_referral=#{idTestexecResultReferral}
update exm_testexec set cur_serialno = #{curSerialno} where id_testexec = #{idTestexec}

update exm_med_result_inques set
des_reason = #{desReason},
des_reply = #{desReply},
where id_testexec_result_inques = #{idTestexecResultInques}

UPDATE exm_med_result_identify SET
id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult},
na_die = #{naDie},
des_die_reason = #{desDieReason},
fg_valid = #{fgValid},
WHERE id_testexec_result_identify = #{idTestexecResultIdentify}

UPDATE exm_med_result_identify_reason SET
id_testexec_result_identify = #{idTestexecResultIdentify},
sd_eva_effciency = #{sdEvaEffciency},
id_inques = #{idInques},
id_body = #{idBody},
id_inspect_item = #{idInspectItem},
id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList},
fg_valid = #{fgValid},
WHERE id_identify_reason = #{idIdentifyReason}
mapper.delete: update exm_med_result_order_log_drugs set fg_valid = '1' where id_order_long_drugs = #{id}
update exm_med_result_order_short_drugs set fg_valid = '1' where id_order_short_drugs = #{id}
update exm_med_result_diagnosis set fg_valid = '1' where id_testexec_result_diagnosis = #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis}
update exm_med_result_die_reason set fg_valid = '1' where id_die_reason = #{idDieReason}
update exm_med_result_die_reason set fg_valid = '1' where id_testexec_result_diagnosis = #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM exm_testexec m LEFT JOIN exm_testplan_detail a ON m.id_testplan_detail = a.id_testplan_detail LEFT JOIN faq_med_tag b ON a.id_medicalrec = b.id_medicalrec LEFT JOIN faq_med_case c ON b.id_med_case = c.id_med_case inner JOIN faq_med_case_patient d ON d.id_med_case = b.id_med_case AND c.cd_med_asse = '003' LEFT JOIN user_info e ON a.id_student = e.user_id LEFT JOIN exm_testplan f ON a.id_testplan = f.id_testplan LEFT JOIN exm_testpaper g ON f.id_testpaper = g.id_testpaper LEFT JOIN exm_med_result o ON o.id_testexec = m.id_testexec LEFT JOIN exm_eva_result p ON o.id_testexec_result = p.id_testexec_result WHERE a.sd_testplan_detail = '2' and m.sd_testexec = '2' AND f.id_org = #{idOrg}
and k.name like concat(#{medicalrecName},'%')
and f.na_testplan like concat(#{naTestplan},'%')
and g.na_testpaper like concat(#{naTestpaper},'%')
and o.fg_asses ='1'
and o.fg_asses !='1'

SELECT a.id_testplan_detail , o.id_testexec_result, case when o.fg_asses ='1' then '2' else '1' end AS status , a.id_testplan , a.id_student , m.dt_exec_begin AS receiveDate , m.duration AS receiveConsumingTime , b.id_medicalrec , k.id_demo , d.name AS patName , d.sex AS patSex , d.age , k.name AS receiveDoc , e.real_name AS medicalrecName , f.na_testplan , f.id_testpaper , g.na_testpaper , p.score_weight AS score , p.sd_title AS ch , '' AssessTeacher , '' AssessDate FROM exm_testexec m LEFT JOIN exm_testplan_detail a ON m.id_testplan_detail = a.id_testplan_detail LEFT JOIN faq_med_tag b ON a.id_medicalrec = b.id_medicalrec LEFT JOIN faq_medicalrec k ON b.id_medicalrec = k.id_medicalrec LEFT JOIN faq_med_case c ON b.id_med_case = c.id_med_case inner JOIN faq_med_case_patient d ON d.id_med_case = b.id_med_case AND c.cd_med_asse = '003' LEFT JOIN user_info e ON a.id_student = e.user_id LEFT JOIN exm_testplan f ON a.id_testplan = f.id_testplan LEFT JOIN exm_testpaper g ON f.id_testpaper = g.id_testpaper LEFT JOIN exm_med_result o ON o.id_testexec = m.id_testexec LEFT JOIN exm_eva_result p ON o.id_testexec_result = p.id_testexec_result WHERE a.sd_testplan_detail = '2' and m.sd_testexec = '2' AND f.id_org = #{idOrg}
and k.name like concat(#{medicalrecName},'%')
and f.na_testplan like concat(#{naTestplan},'%')
and g.na_testpaper like concat(#{naTestpaper},'%')
and o.fg_asses ='1'
and o.fg_asses !='1'
order by m.dt_exec_begin desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT c.name , c.sex , c.age , c.complaint FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_patient c ON c.id_med_case = a.id_med_case WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = #{cdMedAsse}
SELECT a.id_med_case as ext FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = '005'

SELECT a.id_testexec_result_inques,b.is_masculine, a.fg_clue , b.des_inques , b.id_answer , b.des_answer , b.des_expert , b.id_media, b.fg_reason, b.fg_back, a.des_reason, a.des_reply FROM exm_med_result_inques a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inques_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list LEFT JOIN bas_media c on b.id_media = c.id_media WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0' order by a.gmt_create
select id_testexec_result_inques from exm_med_result_inques where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
SELECT a.id_med_case FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = #{cdMedAsse} limit 1
select id_testexec_result_body from exm_med_result_body where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
select id_testexec_result_inspect from exm_med_result_inspect where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList} AND fg_valid = '0'

SELECT a.id_testexec_result_body , a.fg_clue , b.des_body , b.id_result , b.des_result , b.des_expert , b.id_media, b.fg_reason, b.fg_back, a.des_reply FROM exm_med_result_body a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0' order by a.gmt_create

SELECT a.id_testexec_result_inspect , a.fg_clue , b.na_item , b.id_result , b.val_result, b.des_stand, b.des_expert , b.is_masculine, b.id_media, b.fg_reason, b.fg_back, a.des_reply FROM exm_med_result_inspect a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0' order by a.gmt_create

SELECT a.id_testexec_result_referral, a.id_testexec_result, a.sd_eva_referral, a.id_die, a.reason_in, a.fg_exclude, a.reason_out, a.fg_valid, a.gmt_create, a.gmt_modify, b.name as idDieText FROM exm_med_result_referral a LEFT JOIN bas_die b ON a.id_die = b.id_die WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT id_testexec_result_order , id_testexec_result , des_check , sd_nurs_rout , cd_nurs_level , sd_diet , sd_position , des_special , fg_valid , gmt_create FROM exm_med_result_order WHERE fg_valid = '0' and id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id_order_long_drugs, a.id_testexec_result_order, a.id_long_drugs, a.fg_valid, b.name as idLongDrugsText FROM exm_med_result_order_log_drugs a LEFT JOIN bas_drugs b on a.id_long_drugs = b.id_drugs WHERE a.fg_valid = '0' and a.id_testexec_result_order = #{idTestexecResultOrder}

SELECT a.id_order_short_drugs, a.id_testexec_result_order, a.id_short_drugs, a.fg_valid, b.name as idShortDrugsText FROM exm_med_result_order_short_drugs a LEFT JOIN bas_drugs b on a.id_short_drugs = b.id_drugs WHERE a.fg_valid = '0' and a.id_testexec_result_order = #{idTestexecResultOrder}

select a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis, a.id_testexec_result, a.id_die, a.gmt_create, b.NAME, as idDieText from exm_med_result_diagnosis a left join bas_die b on a.id_die = b.id_die where a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0'

select a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis, a.id_testexec_result, a.id_die, a.fg_valid, a.gmt_create, b.name as idDieText from exm_med_result_diagnosis a left join bas_die b on a.id_die = b.id_die where a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and a.fg_valid = '0' limit 1

select id_testexec_result_sumary, id_testexec_result, die_sumary, fg_valid, gmt_create, des_condition_hpi, des_condition_pe, des_condition_fe, des_sumary_hpi, des_sumary_pe, des_sumary_fe from exm_med_result_summary where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and fg_valid = '0' limit 1

SELECT a.id_die_reason, a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis, a.sd_eva_effciency,a.id_med_case_list as id, case a.sd_eva_effciency when '1' then b.des_inques when '2' then c.des_body when '3' then d.na_item else '' end as idText FROM exm_med_result_die_reason a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inques_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 1 LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list c ON a.id_med_case_list = c.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 2 LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list d ON a.id_med_case_list = d.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 3 where a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis = #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis} and a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT '1' AS sdEvaEffciency , a.id_med_case_list AS id , b.des_inques AS idText, b.id_inques as extId FROM exm_med_result_inques a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inques_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
AND b.des_inques like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS sdEvaEffciency , a.id_med_case_list AS id , b.des_body AS idText, b.id_body as extId FROM exm_med_result_body a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
AND b.des_body like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS sdEvaEffciency , a.id_med_case_list AS id , b.na_item AS idText, b.id_inspect_item as extId FROM exm_med_result_inspect a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
AND b.na_item like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT b.id_testexec_result FROM exm_testexec a LEFT JOIN exm_med_result b ON a.id_testexec = b.id_testexec WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.fg_final_result = '1' AND fg_asses = '1'
select* from exm_eva_log where id_testexec_result_dimension in (select id_testexec_result_dimension from exm_eva_dimension where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult})

SELECT '' as stage, '' as operation, b.des_inques as answer, a.gmt_create as logDate FROM exm_med_result_inques a left join faq_med_case_inques_list b on a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT '' as stage, '' as operation, b.des_body as answer, a.gmt_create as logDate FROM exm_med_result_body a left join faq_med_case_body_list b on a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT '' as stage, '' as operation, b.na_item as answer, a.gmt_create as logDate FROM exm_med_result_inspect a left join faq_med_case_inspect_list b on a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
select id_testexec_result,score_weight,sd_title from exm_eva_result where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} limit 1

SELECT a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis as extId, '' as stage, '' as operation, b.name as answer, a.gmt_create as logDate FROM exm_med_result_diagnosis a left join bas_die b on a.id_die = b.id_die WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
SELECT '' AS stage , '' AS operation , '' AS answer , gmt_create AS logDate FROM exm_med_result_die_reason WHERE id_testexec_result_diagnosis = #{idTestexecResultDiagnosis}

select a.id_testexec_result_referral, a.id_testexec_result , a.id_die , a.fg_exclude , a.fg_valid , a.gmt_create , a.gmt_modify, IFNULL(b.NAME,c.NAME) AS idDieText, IF(b.NAME is null, 1, 0) as catalogue from exm_med_result_referral a left join bas_die b on a.id_die = b.id_die and a.fg_die_class = '2' LEFT JOIN bas_die_class c on a.id_die = c.id_dieclass and a.fg_die_class = '1' WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT a.id_referral_reason , a.id_testexec_result_referral , a.sd_eva_effciency , a.id_med_case_list AS id , a.fg_exclude , CASE a.sd_eva_effciency WHEN '1' THEN b.des_inques WHEN '2' THEN c.des_body WHEN '3' THEN d.na_item ELSE '' END AS idText FROM exm_med_result_referral_reason a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inques_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 1 LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list c ON a.id_med_case_list = c.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 2 LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list d ON a.id_med_case_list = d.id_med_case_list AND a.sd_eva_effciency = 3 WHERE a.id_testexec_result_referral = #{idTestexecResultReferral} AND a.fg_valid = '0' order by a.gmt_create
SELECT a.id_testexec_result_diagnosis FROM exm_med_result_diagnosis a WHERE a.id_testexec_result_referral = #{idTestexecResultReferral}

select a.id_testexec_result_referral, IFNULL(bd.id_die,d.id_dieclass) as id_die, if(a.fg_die_class = '1', CONCAT(d.NAME, ''), CONCAT(bd.NAME, '')) as name, bd.cd_dieclass , bdc.NAME AS cdDieclassText , bd.icd , bd.pinyin, a.fg_die_class from exm_med_result_referral a left join bas_die bd on a.id_die = bd.id_die and bd.fg_valid = '0' and a.fg_die_class = '2' left join bas_die_class bdc on bd.cd_dieclass = bdc.cd LEFT JOIN bas_die_class d ON a.id_die = d.cd and a.fg_die_class = '1' WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'
AND (bd.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bd.icd like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bd.pinyin like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or d.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))
select id_testexec_result_sumary from exm_med_result_summary where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult}

SELECT c.id_med_case_list, c.id_inspect_item FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list c ON c.id_med_case = a.id_med_case AND c.fg_valid = '0' LEFT JOIN exm_med_result_inspect d ON c.id_med_case_list = d.id_med_case_list AND d.fg_valid = '0' AND d.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} LEFT JOIN bas_die e ON d.id_die = e.id_die WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = '006' AND c.id_inspect = #{idInspect} and d.id_testexec_result_inspect is null

SELECT IFNULL(sum(c.cost_money), 0.00) as cost_money FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list c ON c.id_med_case = a.id_med_case AND c.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = '006' AND c.id_inspect = #{idInspect}

SELECT c.id_inspect_item FROM faq_med_tag a LEFT JOIN bas_medical_tag b ON a.id_tag = b.id_tag LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list c ON c.id_med_case = a.id_med_case AND c.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} AND b.cd_med_asse = '006' AND c.id_inspect = #{idInspect}

select id_die from exm_med_result_body where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_die is not null union select id_die from exm_med_result_inspect where id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} and id_die is not null
SELECT a.id_testexec_result_referral FROM exm_med_result_referral a WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} AND a.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT count(1) from (SELECT CONCAT('body-',a.id_testexec_result_body) as id, a.fg_clue, b.des_body as checkItem, b.des_result, a.id_die FROM exm_med_result_body a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} union all SELECT CONCAT('inspect-',a.id_testexec_result_inspect) as id, a.fg_clue, b.na_item, b.val_result, a.id_die FROM exm_med_result_inspect a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} ) temp
temp.id_die not LIKE '%,%' or temp.id_die is null
temp.id_die LIKE '%,%'

SELECT id , fg_clue , checkItem , des_result FROM (SELECT CONCAT('body-',a.id_testexec_result_body) as id, a.fg_clue, b.des_body as checkItem, b.des_result, a.id_die FROM exm_med_result_body a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_body_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} union all SELECT CONCAT('inspect-',a.id_testexec_result_inspect) as id, a.fg_clue, b.na_item, b.val_result, a.id_die FROM exm_med_result_inspect a LEFT JOIN faq_med_case_inspect_list b ON a.id_med_case_list = b.id_med_case_list WHERE a.id_testexec_result = #{idTestexecResult} ) temp
temp.id_die not LIKE '%,%' or temp.id_die is null
temp.id_die LIKE '%,%'
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT a.id_medicalrec , a.id_student , b.id_testpaper , c.sd_use FROM exm_testplan_detail a LEFT JOIN exm_testplan b ON a.id_testplan = b.id_testplan LEFT JOIN faq_medicalrec c ON a.id_medicalrec = c.id_medicalrec WHERE a.id_testplan_detail = #{idTestplanDetail}

SELECT c.id_med_case FROM exm_testplan_detail a LEFT JOIN faq_med_tag b ON a.id_medicalrec = b.id_medicalrec inner JOIN faq_med_case c ON b.id_med_case = c.id_med_case AND c.cd_med_asse = '003' WHERE a.id_testplan_detail = #{idTestplanDetail}

select guide_content from faq_med_case_guide where id_med_case = ( SELECT c.id_med_case FROM exm_testplan_detail a LEFT JOIN faq_med_tag b ON a.id_medicalrec = b.id_medicalrec inner JOIN faq_med_case c ON b.id_med_case = c.id_med_case AND c.cd_med_asse = '010' WHERE a.id_testplan_detail = #{idTestplanDetail} )
